speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you, Mr Mitchell. I appreciate the fact that you place some importance on the President of the European Parliament, but he was not invited to Heiligendamm.
original: President. Thank you, Mr Mitchell. I appreciate the fact that you place some importance on the President of the European Parliament, but he was not invited to Heiligendamm.
agenda_item: Conclusions of the G8 meeting - MDGs at the Midway Point (debate)
